title: The Ever Fresh Nature of Krishna Katha | @madhupanditdasaofficial
speaker: HG Madhu Pandit Dasa

segments.key_quote: In the spiritual world, when you are dissatisfied, you are happy.
segments.summary: The speaker explains that hearing about Krishna's pastimes is never satiating, leading to a unique kind of happiness through dissatisfaction.
segments.transcript: It is said that the narration of the pastimes of the Lord is never satiating. Never satiating means one does not become satisfied by hearing the pastimes of the Lord. One wants to hear more and more and more and more. In the material world, you are happy when you are satisfied. In the spiritual world, when you are dissatisfied, you are happy. So, as far as hearing the pastimes of the Lord, you are always dissatisfied, because it is so tasty that you are never satisfied.
